name: basilisk
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an imaginary reptile said to be able to kill by poison or by looking at someone: The herb rue was said to offer protection from basilisks. a basilisk stare (= one that is extremely unfriendly) Synonym
cockatrice
More examplesFewer examples A cock's egg engendered fear and horror because it reputedly hatched into a basilisk.They drew unicorns, dragons, and basilisks.She felt herself wither under the blast of his basilisk stare.They shuddered at her cold tone of voice and basilisk eyes.
